title: Bharat Mobility Show 2025: From Tata to BYD, auto giants line up for Delhi ramp; set to become world's biggest auto expo
description: India's Bharat Mobility Show in January featured 28 automakers, including Tata Motors and Maruti Suzuki, focusing heavily on electric vehicles. The event showed heightened interest, with participation surpassing previous records and competing with major global auto expos. Emerging markets like India are experiencing robust growth in the automotive sector.
